newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Toco warns on lower year earnings.
newsitem.headline: Toco warns on lower year earnings.

text.p: South African industrial group Toco Holdings Ltd said on Friday that total earnings attributable to ordinary shareholders for the year ended March 31, 1997 will be less favourable than anticipated at the time of the publication of the interim results.
The group said in a published advertisement that its results were being finalised and would be published around May 30.
Shareholders were advised to exercise caution in their sharedealings until the results were published.
